Description: Information about the number of additional affordable housing units delivered across Wales by provider, location, housing type, tenure and funding.
Name: Affordable housing provision
Notes: Power BI consisting of a range of tables. We have previous link that should be able to suck data through direct.
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by scrolling down to the latest release and clicking on the 'Affordable housing provision: April 2018 to March 2019' link  Scroll down to data and click on the + click on the  'Affordable Housing Provision' link  there are 12 interactive report located by clicking on the text.
Sizing Notes: Available through the odata route, so simple to get, but may need a number of separate downloads / produce a number of different datasets, so needs a fair amount of up-front analysis
